content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maria. As the landlord, I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 Euros per month. In addition, I want to have the lowest price possible. However, I will pay the monthly rent in cash and I will be responsible for cleaning the apartment and paying for any damages caused by me.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. Based on the size of the apartment and the fact that you are responsible for cleaning and damages, I believe that a monthly rental of 700 Euros would be fair. However, I am open to negotiating with you to find a price that works for both of us. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can't accept this price, I am looking for the lowest possible price. I can't afford 700 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding. TERMINATE.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand your budget constraints, Maria. Unfortunately, I cannot accept a rental price lower than 700 Euros per month for this apartment. I hope you can find something that works for you in Mannheim. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
